ol.li: Spreadsheet tutorial: At the end of this online text you will find directions and examples of using spreadsheet software to create bar graphs and find the mean and standard deviation of data sets. Read through them to understand the steps.

li.p:
Table 1, below, shows the chest sizes of a regiment of Scottish soldiers collected by the makers of their uniforms. The example spreadsheet your instructor gave you should be helpful here. When completing these problems, make sure to show all parts of the spreadsheet.
Use a spreadsheet to create a bar graph for the data in Table 1.
Use a spreadsheet to compute the mean and standard deviation for this data.
